item.title: Sound Smart: 5 Observations from NFL Championship Sunday
item.description: Breaking down the biggest talking points from the conference title games and why the Seahawks and the Patriots advanced to Super Bowl LX.

item.title: Rams QB Matthew Stafford Mum on Future; Sean McVay Upset With Retirement Question
item.description: Matthew Stafford didn't indicate what's next for him, but Sean McVay was incredulous on the question of his quarterback's future.

item.title: Seahawks QB Sam Darnold 'Shut A Lot of People Up Tonight'
item.description: Seahawks QB Sam Darnold continued to rewrite his legacy, adding another chapter with his performance against the Rams on Sunday.

item.title: Sean Payton Has Second Thoughts on Passing Up FG in Broncos AFC Title Game Loss
item.description: Sean Payton admitted that he's second-guessing his decision to go for it on a key fourth down in the Broncos' three-point loss to the Patriots in the ...

item.title: Can Seahawks Avenge Super Bowl XLIX Loss in Historic Rematch with Patriots?
item.description: The Seahawks and Patriots are set for a rematch of Super Bowl XLIX. What's in store?
